trans-unit.note: Flashcard decks and study sessions coming soon
Generate a plan to fill today.
Add due dates to keep planning accurate.
Open Roots to see today's plan
Make colors and borders more distinct
Display helpful hints for interface elements
Users can choose which calendar to save new events to
New events will always be saved to the school calendar
Grant calendar access to sync events with your schedule
This will clear all synced calendar data. You'll need to manually revoke permission in iOS Settings > Roots > Calendars.
Remove calendar access and clear all synced events. You'll need to manually revoke permission in iOS Settings.
How far ahead to scan for events when refreshing
Select the calendar to use for event tracking and scheduling
Calendar UI will show events from all calendars
Calendar UI will only show events from your school calendar
How to display course information throughout the app
Increase visual contrast for better readability
Display energy levels in dashboard and planner
Affects planner scheduling and energy tracking
Remind me before assignments are due
Enable notifications in iOS Settings to receive reminders and alerts
Please enable notifications in Settings to use this feature
Use intelligent suggestions for task scheduling
Automatically add break periods between study sessions
Track and optimize based on your energy levels
How far ahead to schedule tasks and study sessions
This will clear all debug logs and analytics data stored on your device.
Sync data across your devices using iCloud
Your data will be synced across all devices signed in to your iCloud account. Data is encrypted in transit and at rest.
All data stays on this device
All your data stays on this device. No cloud sync or external services are used.
Open iOS Settings to manage calendar, notifications, and other permissions
Export your data as a backup file
This will clear temporary files and cached data. Your tasks, courses, and settings will not be affected.
Unable to create the export file right now.
Your data will be exported as a JSON file that you can save or share.
Clearing cache can free up storage space and may improve performance
Use iOS AlarmKit for loud system alarms
AlarmKit provides system-level alarms that work even when the app is closed.
Alert at each pomodoro phase change

trans-unit.id: 🧪 Phase 5.7: FULL TimerCoreCard with FIXED circles
trans-unit.source: 🧪 Phase 5.7: FULL TimerCoreCard with FIXED circles
Roots needs full calendar access to display and manage your schedule across courses and tasks.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Calendars Full Access Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Roots needs access to your calendar to show and schedule classes and events.
Roots uses Face ID to securely authenticate you when required features request identity verification.
Roots uses your Focus status to pause alerts and adjust notifications during study sessions.
Roots needs full reminders access to sync and manage your tasks safely across devices.
trans-unit.note: Privacy - Reminders Full Access Usage Description

trans-unit.source: Roots needs access to your reminders to show tasks alongside your assignments.
